alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 10:47PM EDT until July 28 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM AND NORTHEASTERN ALLEN COUNTIES... At 1047 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Columbus Grove, or 7 miles south of Ottawa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Bluffton, Columbus Grove, Pandora, Glandorf, Gilboa, and Rockport. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 137 and 141. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
